devdoc.details: Based on https://github.com/Uniswap/merkle-distributor but modified to handle multiple airdrops concurrently

params._merkleRoots: list of merkle roots for each distribution
params._tokens: the list of token addresses to add
params._totalAmounts: list of total distribution amounts for each token*

params._account: address of the account to claim for
params._amount: lifetime amount of the token allocated to account
params._index: index of the claim within the distribution
params._merkleProof: the merkle proof for the token claim*

params._account: address of the account to claim for
params._amounts: list of lifetime amounts of the tokens allocated to account
params._indexes: list of indexes of the claims within the distributions
params._merkleProofs: list of merkle proofs for the token claims*

params._account: address of the account to return claimed amount for*

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pauseForWithdrawal(address).details: must be called before withdrawUnlclaimedTokens to ensure state doesn't change while the new merkle root is calculated

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._enabled: whether to enable or disable the limit*

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateDistribution(address,bytes32,uint2.details: merkle root should be updated to reflect additional amount - the amount for each account should be incremented by any additional allocation and any new accounts should be added to the tree

params._merkleRoot: updated merkle root for token distribution

params._additionalAmounts: list of total additional distribution amounts for each token*
params._merkleRoots: list of updated merkle roots for the distributions
params._tokens: the list of token addresses to update

withdrawUnclaimedTokens(address,bytes32,.details: merkle root should be updated to reflect current state of claims - the amount for each account should be equal to it's claimed amount

devdoc.title: MerkleDistributor

getClaimed(address,address).notice: returns the total amount that an account has claimed from a distribution

pauseForWithdrawal(address).notice: pauses a token distribution for withdrawal of unclaimed tokens

setTimeLimitEnabled(address,bool).notice: enables/disables the time limit for a token

userdoc.notice: Handles token airdrops from an unlimited amount of token rewards
